description:
💻 @mfa_ukraine MFA of Ukraine has launched an information platform for foreign audiences concerning the war in Ukraine ➡️http://war.ukraine.ua
It provides verified information about the situation in 🇺🇦, shares specific ways to support Ukraine, shows the human dimension of the resistance

WHY IS RUSSIA INVADING UKRAINE?
https://war.ukraine.ua/why/

For those , who really want to know. 
Link in profile or saved stories.

https://war.ukraine.ua/why/
#standwithukraine #warinukraine

In 2017, I had this @snidanok TV interview in Kyiv. Now television stations are being bombed. Tragic …..😢😢
Thank you Elon and @spacex for the satellite Internet service, just in time.
For minute-by-minute updates, go to @ukraine.ua website www.war.ukraine.ua 
#Ukraine 🇺🇦💔 #StopTheWar

🌍 An information platform for foreign audiences concerning the war in Ukraine is launched: https://war.ukraine.ua

Live documentation includes:

🎙 the verified information about the situation in Ukraine

🙏 specific ways to support Ukraine 

🙋 stories showing the human dimension of the resistance

🇺🇦 It will become a thoroughly collected archive of Russia’s crimes, atrocities, and barbarism, and more importantly — the heroism and unity of the Ukrainian people.

Please, spread the word!

The website is created and moderated by the @mfa_ukraine and @ukrainian_institute.

أطلقت وزارة الخارجية لأوكرانيا منصة المعلومات للجماهير الأجنبية حول الحرب في أوكرانيا تحت عنوان war.ukraine.ua .
وهدفها الرئيسي هو توفير المعلومات المتحقق منها حول الوضع في أوكرانيا والطرق المحددة لدعم أوكرانيا وكذلك إظهار البعد الإنساني لحركة المقاومة.

قال وزير الخارجية الأوكراني دميترو كوليبا إن هذا الموقع في الواقع توثيق مباشر للحرب التي تتكشف أمام أعين العالم، وأردف قائلاً إنه بعد الانتصار في هذه الحرب في نهاية المطاف سيكون بمثابة أرشيف تم جمعه بعناية للجرائم والفظائع والهمجية الروسية وكذلك في المقام الأول – لأمثلة بطولة ووحدة الشعب الأوكراني.

ويمكنكم الآن الاطلاع في هذا الموقع على المعلومات التالية:

- أسباب الغزو الروسي لأوكرانيا.
- المستجدات الأخيرة في أوكرانيا: يحتوي الموقع على آخر التحديثات من مصادر رسمية.
- سبل مساعدة الأوكرانيين: الروابط والتعليمات المفيدة حول إمكانية تقديم التبرعات للقوات المسلحة الأوكرانية أو الانضمام إلى الفيلق الأجنبي للدفاع الإقليمي لأوكرانيا أو تقديم المساعدة الإنسانية أو تنظيم التظاهرة الاحتجاجية ضد الحرب في وسط أوروبا.
- الوجوه الحقيقية لحركة المقاومة الأوكرانية. الأحداث الحالية الواقعة في أوكرانيا حرب شعبية. وهذا الفصل مخصص للأوكرانيين الذين يقومون بمقاومة بطولية وغير مسبوقة ضد المحتلين الروس. يستحق كل موطن أوكراني مهما كان رجلا أو إمرأة يدافع عن الحرية والقيم المشتركة وأمن القارة الأوروبية كلها أن يعرفه العالم.
تم إنشاء هذا الموقع على أساس منصة ukraine.ua التي سبق لها أن تقدم صورة أوكرانيا للعالم كبلد للحرية والكرامة ودولة أوروبية معاصرة يمتد تاريخها وثقافتها ألف سنة. وبعد بدء الغزو الروسي الواسع النطاق لأوكرانيا، قد تغير هدف المنصة التي تتيح حاليا للمجتمع الدولي إمكانية الوصول الحر إلى معلومات صادقة وصحيحة حول الحرب في أوكرانيا.
يساعد كل منكم الشعب الأوكراني في الدفاع عن أرضه وحرية أوروبا كلها عن طريق نشر المعلومات حول موقع war.ukraine.ua بين أصدقائكم وشركائكم الأجانب.

المجد لأوكرانيا!

https://war.ukraine.ua/

Come persone, e come band, non possiamo restare indifferenti e in silenzio davanti alla tragedia della guerra in Ucraina. Informarsi e fare una donazione è davvero importante.

As human beings, and as a band, we cannot remain indifferent and silent about the tragedy of the war in Ukraine. Getting informed and making a donation is very important.

Info:

https://war.ukraine.ua

Donazioni (link in bio):

https://cri.it/emergenzaucraina/

🇺🇦 Сьогодні Міжнародний жіночий день.

Цей День – для всіх українських жінок, які:
🇺🇦 борються на передових,
🇺🇦 рятують життя,
🇺🇦 захищають своїх рідних,
🇺🇦 залишають свої життя позаду,
🇺🇦 обстоюють свободу.

Ми стоїмо пліч-о-пліч із жінками України. Ми стоїмо пліч-о-пліч з народом України.
Слава Українським Жінкам!
Це відео створено за використання історій українських героїнь, опублікованих на 👉https://war.ukraine.ua/, англомовному сайті МЗС України. 

//

🇪🇺 This Women’s Day is for all Ukrainian women:
🇺🇦 fighting on the frontlines,
🇺🇦 saving lives,
🇺🇦 protecting their loved ones,
🇺🇦 leaving their lives behind, and
🇺🇦 standing up for freedom.

We stand with the women of Ukraine. We stand with the people of Ukraine.

This video was made using stories of Ukrainian heroes published on 👉https://war.ukraine.ua/ 

Follow this site created by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine to keep up to date with the war and Ukraine’s resistance.

#WomensDay #InternationalWomensDay #StandWithUkraine #Ukraine #SlavaUkraini #StrongerTogether #EU #EuropeanUnion

Thanks to the generous support of our audiences, A Concert for Ukraine on Monday, March 14, is sold out. Check our website in the coming days for any ticket returns and tune in to the live broadcast of the concert on National Public Radio, the European Broadcasting Union, Met Opera Radio on @siriusxm channel 355, and metopera.org. We encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website.

Donate at war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/

Photo by Jonathan Tichler / Met Opera

Begin With Love🇺🇦

•

•
•
#hope #peace #love #ukraine🇺🇦 #standwithukraine

How you can help. 
https://war.ukraine.ua/

In preparation for tomorrow’s benefit concert to support Ukraine, Met Music Director @nezetseguin recently joined the @metorchestra and an array of star soloists in the rehearsal room. Tune in tomorrow, March 14, at 6PM ET for a live broadcast of the concert on National Public Radio, the European Broadcasting Union, Metropolitan Opera Radio on @siriusxm channel 355, and metopera.org. For a full list of participating stations, visit metopera.org/ConcertforUkraine.

Even though the performance is sold out, we encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website, war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/.

Photo by Jonathan Tichler / Met Opera

@metopera In these excerpts from A Concert for Ukraine, tonight’s benefit performance to support those suffering from the ongoing war in Ukraine, Music Director @nezetseguin conducts the extraordinary @metorchestra and @metoperachorus and a roster of star soloists, including Ukrainian bass-baritone Vladyslav Buialskyi @umbertokor who gave a moving performance of the Ukrainian national anthem, and soprano @lisedavidsen’s stunning rendition of Strauss’s Four Last Songs. The concert ended with a stirring performance of the finale from Beethoven’s Symphony No. 9 with @elzasoprano @jbartonmezzo @piotrbeczala @speedogreen 
 
The response to the live broadcast was overwhelming, so we’re pleased to announce that the performance will be available to stream on demand, starting at 12PM ET tomorrow, March 15, for seven days at metopera.org.
 
We also encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website, war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/.

Videography by Pete Scalzitti / Met Opera

In these excerpts from A Concert for Ukraine, tonight’s benefit performance to support those suffering from the ongoing war in Ukraine, Music Director @nezetseguin conducts the extraordinary @metorchestra and @metoperachorus and a roster of star soloists, including Ukrainian bass-baritone Vladyslav Buialskyi, who gave a moving performance of the Ukrainian national anthem, and soprano @lisedavidsen’s stunning rendition of Strauss’s Four Last Songs. The concert ended with a stirring performance of the finale from Beethoven’s Symphony No. 9.
 
The response to the live broadcast was overwhelming, so we’re pleased to announce that the performance will be available to stream on demand, starting at 12PM ET tomorrow, March 15, for seven days at metopera.org.
 
We also encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website, war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/.

Videography by Pete Scalzitti / Met Opera

Tonight, the façade of the opera house was lit with the colors of the Ukrainian flag during our benefit performance to support Ukraine and its citizens. Met Music Director @nezetseguin led the @metorchestra and @metoperachorus and a roster of star soloists. The response to the live broadcast was overwhelming, and we're pleased to announce that the broadcast will be available to stream on demand, starting at 12PM ET tomorrow, March 15, for seven days at metopera.org. 

We encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website. 

Donate: war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/

Photo by Jonathan Tichler / Met Opera

When you have the chance to go to The Met for a special performance- the energy and connection you feel to the musicians, artists and other patrons is indescribable.  There is a camaraderie through music that is unlike anything else.  It refocuses you on the humanity of all people.  I’m sure last night was no different.  #standwithukraine #metopera 
.
Repost from @metopera
•

Ми закликаємо кожну людину світу допомогти
нашій Україні в цей складний час.

Офіційні джерела для підтримки нашої держави:
🌐 https://war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/

Привіт, моя люба Україно!
Мені зараз так боляче, як і Тобі!
Але ти не бійся, ми поруч.
Ось наші серця, і ти в них, бо в них безпечно!
Тримайся рідненька! Ми завжди з тобою.
Ти ж бачиш, нас мільйони! У всьому світі!
Так! Ми такі всі різні. Абсолютно різні!
Але ми єдині! Не віддамо тебе нікому!
Ні путіну, ні росії…
Твій вірний, зранений Київ стане сильнішим!
Харків ще не раз здивує тебе!
Твоєю красою зачарується весь світ, бо 
немає іншої такої як ти моя Україно.
Ти така у нас одна!
Єдина!

English👇🏻

We call on everyone in the world to help
our Ukraine in this difficult time.

The official sources to support our country:
🌐 https://war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/

Hello, my dear Ukraine!
I have as much pain now as you do.
But don’t be afraid, we’re close.
Here are our hearts, where you are in, because it’s a safe place!
Hold on dear, we are always with you.
You see, there are millions of us! Worldwide.
Though we are all so different. Absolutely different.
But we are as one! We will not give you to anyone!
Neither putin nor russia…
Your faithful, wounded Kyiv will become stronger!
Kharkiv will surprise you more than once!
The whole world will enchant you with your beauty, 
because there is no other country like you, my Ukraine. You are the only one!

▶️ У каруселі відео: українською, англійською, німецькою, французькою, іспанською, японською та португальською 🌏

Дякуємо @_roland_orban_ @kalush.official 🇺🇦

This past Monday night, the Met offered artistic solace and financial support to those suffering as a result of the ongoing war in Ukraine with our benefit performance, A Concert for Ukraine. The concert ended with the @metorchestra and @metoperachorus’s stirring rendition of the “Ode to Joy” from Beethoven’s Symphony No. 9, led by Music Director @nezetseguin.

The response to the live broadcast was overwhelming, so we’re pleased to offer the full performance, available for streaming on demand, now through March 21 at metopera.org.

We also encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website.

Donate: war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/

Videography by Pete Scalzitti / Met Opera

On Monday evening, the Met presented A Concert for Ukraine, a benefit performance to support those suffering as a result of the ongoing war in Ukraine. In these selections from the concert, Music Director @nezetseguin conducts the @metorchestra, @metoperachorus and an array of star soloists in program that included the Ukrainian national anthem and music by Barber, Strauss, Verdi, and Beethoven.

If you weren’t able to join us, you can listen to a recording of the live radio broadcast on demand now through March 21 at metopera.org.
We also encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website.

Donate today at war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/.

Videography by Pete Scalzitti / Met Opera

Last Monday night, Ukrainian bass-baritone Vladyslav Buialskyi gave a moving performance of the Ukrainian national anthem—joined by the incomparable @metorchestra and @metoperachorus, led by Music Director @nezetseguin—as part of A Concert for Ukraine, our benefit performance to support those suffering as a result of the ongoing war in Ukraine.
 
If you weren’t able to join us, you can listen to a recording of the live radio broadcast on demand, now through April 1, at metopera.org.
 
We also encourage donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website.
 
Donate today at war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/
 
Videography by Pete Scalzitti / Met Opera

#RussiaWarCrimes 

Russia’s atrocities are beyond evil even during war. Now every Russia’s war crime in Ukraine is documented on Ukraine’s official website — https://war.ukraine.ua/russia-war-crimes/ 

On the website, experience just a fraction of how Ukrainians have been forced to live for more than six weeks. To hear the sounds of air raid sirens, warplanes and missile strikes. To read the horrific testimonies of survivors. 

The world has to know the truth. You have to know the truth. Spread the word to bring Russia to justice for everything it committed. 
#RussiaInvadedUkraine #StopRussianAgression

تجتاز أعمال وحشية تقوم بها روسيا خط الشر حتى أثناء الحرب،  ولن تنساها ولن تسامحها لا أوكرانيا ولا العالم. لغرض توثيق كل جريمة، تم إطلاق أرشيف خاص لجرائم الحرب الروسية في أوكرانيا على الموقع الرسمي لأوكرانيا https://war.ukraine.ua/russia-war-crimes/ 
على الموقع، اطلع على الخبرة التي عاشها الأوكرانيون لأكثر من ستة أسابيع.  استمع الى أصوات صفارات الإنذار والطائرات الحربية والصواريخ. إقرأ الشهادات المروعة للناجين. عليك أن تعرف الحقيقة. انشرها لتقديم روسيا إلى العدالة على كل ما ارتكبته.
#RussiaInvadedUkraine #StopRussianAgression

#KejahatanPerangrusia 
Tindak kekejaman tentara rusia terlampau jahat, bahkan saat perang sekali pun. Sekarang, setiap kejahatan perang Rusia di Ukraina didokumentasikan di situs resmi Ukraina — https://war.ukraine.ua/russia-war-crimes/
Di situs tersebut, Anda dapat menyaksikan sebagian kecil dari bagaimana rakyat Ukraina harus bertahan hidup selama lebih dari enam minggu. Bagaimana rasanya mendengar suara sirene serangan udara, pesawat tempur, dan serangan rudal. Bagaimana rasanya membaca kesaksian-kesaksian yang mengerikan dari mereka yang berhasil selamat.
Seluruh dunia harus tau kebenarannya. Anda harus tau kebenarannya. Sebarkan informasi ini agar rusia diadili atas semua yang telah mereka lakukan.

#rusiaInvasiUkraina
#HentikanAgresirusia #russiaInvadedUkraine #StoprussianAgression

Cancel Putin, not Pushkin.

Support the people of Ukraine at war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/.

Halo Rakyat Indonesia Sahabat Ukraina!

Kementerian Luar Negeri Ukraina bersama beberapa mitra, baru saja meluncurkan situs dengan arsip online kejahatan perang rusia, yaitu https://war.ukraine.ua/russia-war-crimes. Situs ini menyajikan informasi terkait kejahatan, jumlah korban, pernyataan penyintas, serta memberikan pengalaman seperti berada di tengah situasi perang, dengan efek rekaman audio saat kita mengakses situs. Kunjungi situs kami untuk terus mengawal keadilan dan kemanusiaan untuk Ukraina.

Ukrainian culture is in flames. Russia aims to not only kill Ukrainians but to erase their heritage. Centuries of architecture, art, human passion, history and beauty. Today, on #WorldHeritageDay, the day all about the preservation of cultural landmarks, rockets and bombs still rain on Ukrainian people, churches, museums and theatres. 

Each of us has a voice. Support Ukraine by spreading the word so that beauty doesn’t die in silence under Russia’s shelling. Save Ukraine’s cultural heritage, demand to stop the war: https://war.ukraine.ua/art-and-culture-during-the-war/ 

#ARTvsWAR #StandwithUkraine

Seluruh dunia telah mendengar cerita-cerita tentang perjuangan orang Ukraina yang patut dikagumi. Kini, kamu dapat melihat potret perlawanan Ukraina di situs web resmi kami. Kami telah mengumpulkan lebih dari 100 cerita tentang orang-orang Ukraina yang gagah berani dalam melawan agresi rusia. 

https://war.ukraine.ua/heroes/

rusia berencana untuk merenggut kemerdekaan kami. Tapi rusia tidak mengira bahwa setiap orang Ukraina akan bergegas untuk melindungi apa yang merupakan miliknya.
Ini adalah perang rakyat. Dan kami memerlukan bantuan dari sesama orang pemberani, seperti kamu. 
Dukung kami. 
#DukungParaPemberani
#SupportTheBrave

The world has already heard stories about incredible Ukrainians. 

Now you can see a portrait of the Ukrainian resistance on our official website. 

We have collected more than 100 stories of brave Ukrainians who stood up against Russian aggression. https://war.ukraine.ua/heroes/

Russia planned to take away our freedom quickly. But they did not consider every Ukrainian who rushes to defend his own.
It is a people's war. 

And we need the help of the same brave people. 

Just like you.

Support us. 

#SupportTheBrave
donate donate donate! >> https://war.ukraine.ua/ (link also in bio) #stopwar #stopputin #standwithukraine #russianwarshipgofuckyourself #armukrainenow

💙💛Світ уже почув історії про неймовірних українців. Тепер ви можете ще й побачити портрет українського спротиву на офіційному сайті війни в Україні. Тут зібрали понад 100 історій відважних українців, які повстали проти російської агресії: war.ukraine.ua/heroes/ (посилання у біо) 

Росія планувала забрати нашу свободу швидко. Але не врахувала кожного українця, який рветься захищати своє.

І цим українцям потрібна допомога від таких самих сміливців, як вони самі.
 
Підтримайте Україну. #SupportTheBrave

The world has already heard stories about incredible Ukrainians. Now you can see a portrait of the Ukrainian resistance on our official website. We have collected more than 100 stories of brave Ukrainians who stood up against Russian aggression: https://war.ukraine.ua/heroes/

Russia planned to take away our freedom quickly. But they did not consider every Ukrainian who rushes to defend their own.

It is a people's war. And we need the help of the same brave people. 
Just like you.

Support us. #SupportTheBrave

We are proud to share that our @metorchestra has donated $17,000 directly to the National Opera House of Ukraine. Donations from the Met Orchestra, the Met’s music staff, and a significant contribution from Music Director @nezetseguin were raised with the hope that it demonstrates our solidarity with all musicians in Ukraine and inspires other musical institutions around the world to join this vital fundraising initiative.

We also encourage continued donations to relief efforts, which can be made through the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine website, war.ukraine.ua/support-ukraine/.

Photo by Evan Zimmerman / Met Opera
